CustomField.formula: (IF( ISPICKVAL( Offer_to_Place_Order__c , "Pass") || ISPICKVAL( Offer_to_Place_Order__c , "N/A") , 1, 0 ) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Ask_for_Purchase_Order_Number__c , "Pass") || ISPICKVAL( Ask_for_Purchase_Order_Number__c , "N/A") , 1, 0)) / 2
CustomField.label: Order Management Total %
